/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. Trees and streetlights punctuate the view, providing a sense of order amidst the city's hustle and bustle. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and cars.
